name: ✿ flowers for you ✿
description:
It’s Flower Day and love is in bloom!...Or is it?

On this special day, everyone in town gives flowers to the ones they love.

But for Clove...

It hasn't been the same ever since he was a kid.

Years later, when new boy Sorrell moves in, it might finally be time for a budding change.

Will Clove finally give flowers to the one he likes...or stay the same?

✿ Characters ✿

Clover / 'Clove'

Assistant to Grandpa Sprout's flower shop. Always has a frowny face.

Sorrell

Enjoys making up songs with Daisy, his ukulele. Doesn't know there are twigs on his head.

Buddy / 'Bud'

Clove's best pal and supporter. Has a date for Flower Day (a real date!).

Grandpa Sprout / 'Master Sprout'

Looks after Clove. No one knows where he got his magenta fan, but it works. Ohoho~

✿ Credits✿

Writer/Programmer: cairirie

Artist/GUI: koolydragon

Music from Peritune (http://peritune.com/ )

✿ Status: In-progress! ✿

~10 minutes of demo!

Unfortunately, we could only start production around late March (whew!). It's a bit rough around the edges but the story so far is about 70% done!  We aim to add CGs, more sprites, 3 endings, and finish this by end of April - mid May（＾－＾✿）

We'd still appreciate any feedback or comments!

✿ Thank you~! ✿
